topics.body:
I'm gonna say something that'll piss of fangirls.
Black Butler is not shonen. No matter what ANYONE says, Black Butler will never be shonen. Does it run in a shonen magazine? Yes. Is it in and of itself a shonen series? Hell no.

topics.body:
I found a text post that highlights some of the problems with Power rangers compared to sentai.

Power rangers fight scenes have a ton of One liners and kiais, While Sentai fight scenes usually just has grunts and an occasional line of dialogue.

Also, If you compare fight scenes, They apparently trimmed down the more brutal fight scenes. (And sometimes they add more flipping to hide the more brutal fights in the more recent ones apparently.)

Also, The locations kind of feel Generic in PR. (I'm not a big fan, But it sure looks that way to me)
